flavorText:
"Pathetic—like I wouldn't know a goblin painted up to look like a dwarf!"
—Pashad ibn Asim, Suq'Ata trader

foreignData.name: Goblinspäher
foreignData.text: Bringe drei Goblinspäher- Spielsteine ins Spiel. Behandle diese Spielsteine wie 1/1 rote Kreaturen mit Gebirgstarnung, die als Goblins zählen.

name: Goblin Scouts
originalText: Put three Goblin Scout tokens into play. Treat these tokens as 1/1 red creatures with mountainwalk that count as Goblins (if defending player controls any mountains, these creatures are unblockable).

rulings.text: The tokens are of creature type Goblin and Scout. They are affected by things that affect Goblins.
The tokens have ‘Mountainwalk’ in their text, and will be affected by text-changing effects accordingly.

text: Create three 1/1 red Goblin Scout creature tokens with mountainwalk. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)
